articles.title: Norway: Alessandra wins 'Melodi Grand Prix' with 'Queen of Kings' - Eurovision.tv
articles.description: Alessandra has won the 2023 edition of Norway's 'Melodi Grand Prix'. The song 'Queen of Kings' will be the Norwegian entry to the 67th Eurovision Song Contest in Liverpool.
